title: GFBio Data Collections
description: Central data hub to store and retrieve json for communication and synchronization of user data between different services.
notes: This work was supported by the German Research Foundation (DFG) within the project “Establishment of the National Research Data Infrastructure (NFDI)” in the consortium NFDI4Biodiversity (project number [442032008](https://gepris.dfg.de/gepris/projekt/442032008)).
